detail_desc: Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Trousers in a lightweight linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Trousers in a lightweight linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

A pair of shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Chino shorts in soft, stretch cotton twill with diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Chino shorts in soft, stretch cotton twill with diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, fitted dress with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back, half-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Short, fitted dress with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back, half-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Short, fitted dress with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back, half-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning.

Non-wired sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathered seam under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and smocking over the shoulders. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and smocking over the shoulders. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and smocking over the shoulders. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, button placket and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a rounded hem.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, button placket and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a rounded hem.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, button placket and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a rounded hem.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Calf-length dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Turtle neck that is twisted at the front, a V-shaped opening at top and an opening down the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Seam with decorative gathers under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.

Calf-length dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Turtle neck that is twisted at the front, a V-shaped opening at top and an opening down the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Seam with decorative gathers under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey with a yoke and long sleeves in mesh. Round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a slit at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with gently rounded cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with gently rounded cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut, double-breasted, knee-length coat in a soft, felted wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with off-centre seams. Detachable tie belt at the waist, jetted side pockets, an inner pocket with a button, and a single back vent. Lined.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the top and a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Laser-cut edges at the hems.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with faceted sparkly stones around the neckline. Narrow cut at the top and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
Fitted dress in glittery jersey with a V-neck, decorative, gathered seam at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.

Short dress in soft velour with a round neckline, a deep opening at the back and concealed button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves, a seam at the waist and gathers in the sides of the skirt for a close fit. Jersey lining.

Short dress in soft velour with a round neckline, a deep opening at the back and concealed button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves, a seam at the waist and gathers in the sides of the skirt for a close fit. Jersey lining.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants in hammered metal. Diameter 5.5 cm.
Lightweight trainers in imitation leather with a padded mesh edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in soft, supple leather with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, large front pockets, extra-long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Tube scarf in soft faux fur.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front, front pockets, a zipped inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Five pairs with pearly pendants. Size from 1.5 cm to 4 cm.
Metal rings in various designs, two decorated with a pearly bead.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with one large zipped compartment at the top, an open inner compartment and two outer compartments, both with a zip. Adjustable shoulder strap with a carabiner hook at the bottom that allows you to choose which shoulder you want to carry your bag on. Size approx. 17x32 cm.
Metal earrings in various geometric shapes with marbled, stone-like details in plastic. Length from approx. 3 cm to 7 cm.
Metal earrings in various geometric shapes with marbled, stone-like details in plastic. Length from approx. 3 cm to 7 cm.
Short necklace with asymmetric plastic beads. Adjustable length 37-45 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, asymmetric seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Smocking at the back of the hem and at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, asymmetric seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Smocking at the back of the hem and at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, asymmetric seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Smocking at the back of the hem and at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the waist.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with long sleeves. Overlocked edges at the neck, cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with long sleeves. Overlocked edges at the neck, cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with long sleeves. Overlocked edges at the neck, cuffs and hem.

Body in microfibre and lace with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. Mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs. Medium coverage at the back.

Body in microfibre and lace with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. Mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs. Medium coverage at the back.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. Firm shaping effect on the waist and hips.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. Firm shaping effect on the waist and hips.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. Firm shaping effect on the waist and hips.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Folded, glued edge at the top and laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Set with a hat, scarf and pair of gloves in a soft fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top and turn-up at the hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs. Scarf with fringes along the short sides.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Short necklace with glass beads, small metal pendants and a metal fastener. Adjustable length approx. 40-48 cm.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with frills down the front and a V-neck with ties at the neckline. Short puff sleeves with elasticated frill trims, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
